author: Goviet nam-2015-10-23T06:40:55-0400
title: Go for a picnic after busy days, relax, restore health, set up a meeting, training, party.
text:
Travel Articles | October 23, 2015 
A cooling & fresh environment in four seasons of fresh flowers and trees intermixing with construction of modern architecture. 
Offering hotel guests superior services and a broad range of amenities, Hoa Su Villa - Tien Lang Spa Resort is committed to ensuring that your stay is as comfortable as possible. Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer, meeting facilities are just a few of the facilities that set Hoa Su Villa - Tien Lang Spa Resort apart from other hotels in the city. Tien Lang hot mineral water stream econogical tourist resort is an ideal spot for customers who need to set up a meeting, go for a picnic after busy days, rest and relax, restore health. 
At Sunflower One Catba Hotel , every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. To do so, the hotel provides the best in services and amenities. A selection of top-class facilities such as 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking can be enjoyed at the hotel. A wide range of premium services are available for guests of Sunflower One Catba Hotel, such as babysitting/child services, a concierge and a ticket service. Wireless internet is also available. Sunflower One Catba Hotel provides easy access to Cat Ba National Park. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Hai Phong.
